snippet: Joe Nick Patoski’s new book about the Dallas Cowboys — less a sports story than a mixture of history and cultural analysis — sees the football franchise and its city as inextricably linked.
lead_paragraph: Joe Nick Patoski’s new book about the Dallas Cowboys — less a sports story than a mixture of history and cultural analysis — sees the football franchise and its city as inextricably linked.

headline.seo: Linking History and Fortunes of Dallas and the Cowboys
headline.main: Linking History and Fortunes of a City and a Team
headline.print_headline: Linking History and Fortunes of a City and a Team
